thread.title: Drew Peterson now in federal custody, officials say
thread.title_full: Drew Peterson now in federal custody, officials say

author: FOX 32 Chicago
title: Drew Peterson now in federal custody, officials say
text:
Drew Peterson now in federal custody, officials say 
By FOX 32 Chicago Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre Email Print 

Ex-cop and convicted wife-killer Drew Peterson was transferred from the Illinois Department of Corrections to federal custody on Tuesday, according to IDOC officials. 
IDOC officials said Peterson was transferred into federal custody Tuesday evening after it was initially being reported he was out of state custody for several hours. 
"For safety and security purposes, the IDOC does not discuss details concerning the placement of offenders who are transferred under the terms of the Interstate Compact Agreement," an IDOC spokesman said via email. Previous coverage...
